# supportedDepthDataFormats

**Instance Property**

The list of data formats compatible with this video format.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportedDepthDataFormats: [AVCaptureDevice.Format] { get }
```

## Discussion

Depth data capture requires a compatible pairing of video format and depth data format. After you set a capture device’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeFormat] property to this format, you can set the device’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeDepthDataFormat] property to one of the formats in this array.

Supported depth data formats always match the aspect ratio of their corresponding video format.

## Determining depth capture support

- **supportedVideoZoomFactorsForDepthDataDelivery**: The zoom factors that a format supports for depth data delivery.
